002C74FC.ChannelSpeechTooltip: Enable/Disable the channel name during text to speech.

0077F1EC.QuestDialogSubtitlesTooltip: Display quest dialog in chat bubbles during in-game scripted sequences.

00C59F8B.HotKeyActionWheelBindingRightTooltip: Uses the item or action bound to this position on the right wheel.

0424B494.GeoComplexityTooltip: Controls the distance at which meshes start to lose detail. Decreasing this will increase performance.

0434B715.MaxForegroundFPSTooltip: Enable this option to limit and adjust the maximum framerate while running in the foreground.

0454FD2D.DLSSGPUTooltip: {c_red}DLSS can only be enabled if you have an RTX capable NVIDIA GPU{/c}

04DF1AED.PriorityTooltip:
Adjusts variable resolution threshold balancing image quality and responsiveness.

{c_highlight}Frame rate: {/c} Reduces rendering resolution when frame rate drops below 60 fps - targeting improved latency
{c_highlight}Image Quality: {/c} Improved image quality at the expense of frame rate

09967943.FontColorWhisperTooltip: Whispered messages will appear in this color in text chat.

0A42EF81.LocaleSelectionTooltip: Select which language you would like to use.

0AF2B609.AutoProgressDialogTooltip:
{c_highlight}Enabled:{/c} Cutscenes will progress automatically without requiring player interaction.
{c_highlight}Disabled:{/c} Certain cutscenes will pause after each line, requiring player input to continue. This feature may not apply to all cutscenes in the game.

0C2C63D1.RaytracedReflectionsQualityTooltip:
Determines the realism of ray-traced reflections. Relies on your computer's graphics processor(GPU). Lowering this setting will improve performance.

{c_highlight}Disabled:{/c} No ray-traced reflections.
{c_highlight}Low:{/c} Single ray ray-traced reflections, with approximated blur from rough materials.
{c_highlight}High:{/c} Multi rays ray-traced reflections, giving accurate blur from rough materials.

{c_red}Ray tracing is currently WIP, expect a significant a performance hit and possibly instability when enabled {/c}

0D485D98.HotKeyActionWheelBindingLeftTooltip: Uses the item or action bound to this position on the left wheel.

0F9F6059.HotKeyExitChatTooltip:
Removes active focus from text chat.

{c_red}Cannot be rebound.{/c}

0FF4F408.HotKeyForceInteractTooltip: Used to look at certain points of interest. Can also be used as a fallback key for interacting with objects and non-playable characters in the world.

11D35C56.FSRTooltip:
When enabled game will render at a lower resolution, based on selected setting, and will be upscaled to display resolution using spatial upscaling techniques.

{c_highlight}Significantly improves performance at the cost of sharpness and image quality.{/c}

12413041.FurQualityTooltip:
Controls the level of quality of fur on player equipment, enemies, and the environment. Decrease to improve performance.

{c_highlight}Low:{/c} Lowest density of fur, some edge artifacts may be visible.
{c_highlight}Medium:{/c} Medium density of fur, moderate visual quality.
{c_highlight}High:{/c} High density of fur, highest visual quality.

14EA53B9.PlayerErrorAudioModeTooltip:
Controls the dialog lines spoken by the player when error text appears on the screen.

{c_highlight}On:{/c} All dialog lines are spoken
{c_highlight}Off:{/c} No dialog lines are spoken
{c_highlight}Simple:{/c} An error noise is played in place of the dialog lines.

1696D1CF.BlackPointDescriptionController: Use {icon:l_horiz, 2} to adjust the black point to determine the maximum luminance that will appear black.

185C044F.VoiceChatRestricted: Voice Chat use is restricted for this user.

190D72A7.FogTooltip:
Controls both the method and quality of shadows. Decreasing this may greatly improve performance.

{c_highlight}Low:{/c} Low-resolution fog
{c_highlight}Medium:{/c} Medium-resolution fog
{c_highlight}High:{/c} High-resolution fog

1B48345E.VoiceChatMicrophoneOutputVolumeTooltip: This adjusts the outgoing volume of your own voice.

1BAC61DA.HotkeyEquippablesTooltip: Toggles the Character details and Inventory panel.

1C3F6BA1.HotKeyChatQuickMessageTooltip: Activates the quick message menu for sending pre-written phrases.

1E060CFA.OutlineOccludedActorsTooltip: Draws a highlight around you when obscured from vision.

1EF80AE5.ReverseSpeakersTooltip: Swap the sound coming from the left and right speakers.

201DDFF7.WaterSimTooltip: Determines the size of the texture used to simulate water. Higher quality will result in more detail, but it requires more video memory. Texture Quality relies on your total video memory (VRAM).

21679A44.BackgroundOpacityTooltip: Adjusts the background opacity for subtitles.

235E0FB3.AdvancedTooltipCompareTooltip:
{c_highlight}Enabled:{/c} When comparing item tooltips, properties gained, lost, and changes to equipped Skills will be displayed.
{c_highlight}Disabled:{/c} When comparing item tooltips, only the primary stat will be compared.

2389DF0F.ScreenReaderSpeedTooltip: Adjusts the speed of screen reader dictation.

243BAA1F.ResolutionTooltip: Higher resolution will result in increased clarity, but this greatly affects performance. Choose a resolution that matches the aspect ratio of your monitor.

277CF613.HotKeyCombinedMovePS_InteractTooltip:
When pressed:
{c_highlight}Move:{/c} If your cursor is over terrain, your character will move to that location.
{c_highlight}Interact:{/c} If your cursor is over a clickable object or non-playable character, your player will interact with that object or character.
{c_highlight}Basic Skill:{/c} If your cursor is over a target that can be attacked, your player will cast the ability assigned to your Basic Skill Slot.

2A325961.ItemDropSoundQualityTooltip: Apply this effect to items at this quality level or higher.

2CF246B9.VoiceChatVolumeTooltip: This adjusts the volume of incoming voice chat.

2E8B6561.DLSSTooltip:
When {c_highlight}Deep Learning Super Sampling{/c} is enabled, the game will render at a lower resolution, based on selected setting, and will be upscaled to the display's resolution using deep learning.

{c_highlight}Significantly improves performance but may introduce visual artifacts.{/c}

2F3F72C1.FontColorTooltip: Adjusts the font color of the subtitles.

331A663F.RaytracingTooltip:
Enable real time ray-tracing. Requires hardware accelerated GPU for ray-tracing.

{c_red} Ray tracing is currently WIP, expect a significant a perfomance hit and possibly instablility when enabled {/c}

33B59DF8.ItemDropSoundAmbientTooltip: Enables sound effects when an item in the world is nearby.

354BD78D.QuestDialogChatTooltip: Output all quest dialog to chat window.

37EC9D4F.RealIDHashesTitle: Show Real ID Names & BattleTag identifiers

38D2440D.OSCommandControlTooltip: Use Command key and Control key interchangeably.

397CB681.SSAOTooltip:
Controls the number of samples used for SSAO. Decreasing this may improve performance.

{c_highlight}Low:{/c} 16 Samples 
{c_highlight}High:{/c} 24 Samples

3A0F929B.SpeechVolumeTooltip: Adjusts the speech volume of text to speech voice.

3A2BA5ED.PeripheralLightingTooltip: Toggles lighting effects on connected peripherals.

3AA6CC5A.LockActionBarsTooltip: Prevents the user from picking up/dragging Skills on the action bar. This function can be bound to a key in the keybindings interface.

3AE89766.SafeZoneTooltip: Adjust the extents of your screen space

3B4E2F5A.ItemDropSoundToggleTooltip: Enables sound effects tied to items dropping in the world.

3B866F0F.NotificationFriendOnlineTooltip: Displays a notification when a friend comes online.

3C5DFC5C.ClanGameChannelTooltip: Enable/Disable text to speech for the Clan channel.

3F75C65F.HealingNumbersTooltip: Display floating health numbers above characters, showing healing effects on player.

3FF92B31.InnerDeadZoneTooltip: Inner Dead Zone increases the dead zone from the stick's neutral state out, making it take longer to start registering input.

40155D49.SoundChatLineBreaks: Play sound separating chat line breaks

4045D837.ItemDropSoundTypeSocketableTooltip:
Apply this effect to all socketable items.

{icon:AttributeBullet, 0.6}  Gems
{icon:AttributeBullet, 0.6}  Skulls

41008180.HighlightEnemyColorTooltip: Controls the color of enemey highlights.

414D0106.DamageNumbersTooltip:
{c_highlight}Enabled:{/c} All damage dealt by the player is displayed as floating numbers on screen.
{c_highlight}Disabled:{/c} Only damage dealt by special hits are displayed as floating numbers.

436E5C20.NotificationDisplayWindowTooltip: Display notifications in toast windows. If disabled, these messages will continue to be displayed in the chat window.

447A7954.ScreenReaderVoiceTooltip: Defines the type of voice heard when screen reader is enabled.

44891B38.LockTargetPersistsTooltip: When using lock target and your target dies, it will auto select a new one as long as a target remains.

44D458AC.AdapterTooltip: Select the graphics processing unit (GPU) that you would like to use.

459C3B73.NotificationFriendAchievementTooltip: Displays a notification when a friend earns a Challenge.

46304564.ResetDefaultsConfirmation: Are you sure you want to reset {s1} to default settings?

469DDF89.HDRTooltip:
Allows for more detail in the lights and darks of the game visuals.

HDR is only available if your monitor supports it.

472A1194.FontColorGuildOfficerTooltip: Clan officer messages will appear in this color in text chat.

4895D55A.ChatBubblesTradeTooltip: Displays text chat from a trade channel member over their head.

4922E32D.NotificationFriendOfflineTooltip: Displays a notification when a friend goes offline.

4969032D.ItemLabelsTooltip: Briefly display item label when the item drops on the ground.

49BF24C6.RefreshRateTooltip: Controls the number of frames your monitor can display per second.

49D24F7D.BrightnessDescription: Adjust the brightness slider until the logo is barely visible.

4CBC6F47.HeightFieldGeometryDetailTooltip: Controls the amount of detail used to render terrain meshes. Decreasing this will increase performance.

4D8A1D8D.ControllerCycleTargetLockTooltipRight:
Allows you to use the right stick to change your locked target.
{c_highlight}You will not be able to bind right-stick to other actions while this is enabled.{/c}

505F5090.STTNotificationStart: Speech to text allows you to add closed captioning in a voice channel. Transcription started.

51516BF5.ChatBubblesLocalTooltip: Displays text chat from a nearby player over their head.

51A436E9.ControllerPersistTargetLockTooltip: If enabled, target lock will remain active between encounters.

56C45554.Disable the operating system keyboard sh: :  in Security & Privacy preferences, located in System Preferences.{/c}

58790C8F.WhitePointDescription: Adjust the white point to determine the minimum luminance that will appear white.

58DA84E5.HotKeyInteractToolip: Used to look at certain points of interest. Can also be used as a fallback key for interacting with objects and non-playable characters in the world.

58DF6816.FontColorGuildTooltip: Clan messages will appear in this color in text chat.

5B6CC2F6.CurrencyTooltip: Select which currency type you would like to use for the Real Money Auction House.

5B830008.ChatBubblesClanTooltip: Displays text chat from a clan member over their head.

5B96185C.ItemDropSoundTypeJewelryTooltip:
Apply this effect to all jewelry items.

{icon:AttributeBullet, 0.6}  Rings
{icon:AttributeBullet, 0.6}  Amulets

5C45F36F.ShowPlayersNearYouTooltip:
Allows you to see other players on your network who are currently online. These players will be displayed by their BattleTag. 

Disabling this feature prevents both you from seeing other players on your network and them from seeing you.

5D63266F.HotkeyTargetLockTooltip: When engaged on a target, all offensive abilities will attempt to hit that target.

5DFB7A8E.TradeGameChannelTooltip: Enable/Disable text to speech for the Trade channel.

5F4897D1.NPCNameTextColorTooltip: Changes the color of NPC Names displayed within subtitles.

60EF3F9E.ActionWheelTooltip:
{c_highlight}Press and Hold:{/c} Use the Action Wheel by pressing and holding the Action Wheel key.
{c_highlight}Press to Toggle:{/c} Press the Action Wheel key to toggle the wheel on and off. Using the wheel does not require holding the key.

611C8C51.CursorScaleTooltip: Adjusts all cursor sizing within the game.

6257D921.HotKeyPageUpChatTooltip: Scrolls text chat up by a page.

62924FAD.AudioDeviceTooltip:
The output device is where your sound will play.

Default will match your systems output device. Use this if you want to play the game through head phones or a different set of speakers.

62B5AECE.HotKeyGameMenuTooltip:
Toggles the Game Menu.

{c_red}Cannot be rebound.{/c}

62C15223.HotkeyMountSpeedTooltip: Gives your mount a burst of speed.

64184B24.ChatBackgroundOpacityTooltip: Adjusts the opacity of your chat window background when the window is active.

64227415.OSCommandLeftRightTooltip: Hold down Command key and left click to simulate a right click.

644C609C.TextureTooltip:
Determines the clarity and size of textures used throughout the game. Higher texture quality will result in more detail, but it requires more system memory (RAM) and video memory (VRAM).

{c_highlight}Medium:{/c} 3 GB
{c_highlight}High:{/c} 8 GB

64BB3413.WhitePointDescriptionController: Use {icon:l_horiz, 2} to adjust the white point to determine the minimum luminance that will appear white.

68A390AC.RaytracedShadowsQualityTooltip:
Determines the realism of ray-traced shadows. Relies on your computer's graphics processor(GPU). Lowering this setting will improve performance.

{c_highlight}Disabled:{/c} No ray-traced shadows.
{c_highlight}Low:{/c} Single ray ray-traced shadows.
{c_highlight}High:{/c} Multi rays ray-traced shadows, giving accurate contact hardening and soft shadows.

{c_red}Ray tracing is currently WIP, expect a significant a performance hit and possibly instability when enabled {/c}

68E26C04.OSCommandControlTitle: Use Command key as Control key

6A511264.ShowPlayersNearYou: Enable Display of Local Network Players

6BD950DD.PlayerNameTextColorTooltip: Changes the color of the Player's Name displayed within subtitles.

6BDEBF75.HotKeyClassScreenTooltip: Toggles your class-specific mechanic screen if relevant.

6BEAFCC3.WorldLocationsTextColorTooltip: Changes the color of World Locations displayed within subtitles.

6CEFAC6B.HotKeyQuickResponseTooltip:
Enables controls to respond to social requests from other players.

{c_red}Cannot be rebound.{/c}

6D2ECA11.FontColorTradeTooltip: Trade channel messages will appear in this color in text chat.

6F9E3BDB.LowFXTooltip: Reduces the number of rendered particle system effects. Checking this may greatly improve performance.

71A74D1B.HotKeyHoldPositionTooltip: Allows the player to attack without moving.

71D5AB15.KeyboardCombineMovePrimarySkillAndIntera: Combine Move / Interact / Basic Skill Slot

7361DA04.OuterDeadZoneTooltip: Outer Dead Zone adds a new dead zone to stick inflection, effectively shorting an input curves present making players hit maximum inflection sooner.

743538AD.FontColorCombatWarningTooltip: Combat warning messages will appear in this color in text chat.

747B7EFE.MonsterHealthBarTooltip: Configure the display mode for monster health bar.

74DB6AEA.FontScaleTooltip: Adjusts all font sizing within the game

760C540F.HighlightPlayerColorTooltip: Controls the color of your player highlight.

77BDDD2F.MasterVolumeTooltip: This controls the volume of all sounds in the game.

78134B01.DisplayTooltip: Allows you to change the primary display mode of the game to Fullscreen, Windowed, or Windowed (Fullscreen). Windowed modes may cause a drop in performance.

781F55C2.HotKeyPrimarySkillTooltip: Casts the ability assigned to this slot.

789B033F.ItemLabelsOnDropTooltip: Briefly display item label when the item drops on the ground.

79BDD86C.ControllerInteractCombinedTitleTooltip:
When pressed:
{c_highlight}Interact:{/c} If your cursor is over a clickable object or non-playable character, your player will interact with that object or character.
{c_highlight}Basic Skill:{/c} If your cursor is over a target that can be attacked, your player will cast the ability assigned to your Basic Skill Slot.

7BD13FDF.HotKeyChatTooltip:
Sets focus to the text chat input field.

{c_red}Cannot be rebound.{/c}

7C3F7881.BrightnessDescriptionController: Use {icon:l_horiz, 2} to adjust the brightness slider until the logo is barely visible.

7C70DC84.HotKeyZoomTooltip: Toggles between a zoomed in and zoomed out state.

7D317BB0.HighlightPlayerTooltip: Draws a highlight around the player.

7D7F968E.XeSSTooltip:
Intel® Xe Super Sampling (XeSS) technology uses machine learning to deliver more performance with exceptional image quality.

{c_highlight}Significantly improves performance at the cost of sharpness and image quality.{/c}

7D90ACC0.SoundChannelsTooltip: Adjust the number of Sound Channels used.

7DD9B0BC.Disable the operating system keyboard sh: :  is checked in the Universal Access preference pane in the System Preferences.{/c}

7DFEC9A0.FontColorPublicChatTooltip: Local area messages will appear in this color in text chat.

7E4BD849.DynamicShadowsTooltip: Toggles whether dynamic shadows are rendered. Turning this off may increase performance.

8315E78E.PlayerHealthTooltip: Show player health bars above characters.

83708E99.HotkeyTownPortalTooltip: Casts Town Portal and returns you to the nearest discovered capital city.

84141836.HotKeyMoveTooltip: Moves the player to their cursor's location when pressed.

845B52B3.NotificationFriendRequestTooltip: Displays a notification when you receive a friend request.

848AE989.ReflectionsTooltip: Determines whether Screen Space Reflections are rendered.

84C18EDC.DefensiveMessagesTooltip: Display floating numbers above monsters, showing blocks, parries, and dodges.

86B0AA9F.AxeEmulateQualityTooltip:
AXE ONLY
Enabling forces the game to run with emulated console quality settings.

86CE1153.MinionHealthBarsTooltip: Show health bars above summoned minions.

8C31E12C.VOIPSliderTooltip: Adjusts the amount of attenuation on game sounds when someone in your party is speaking in voice chat.

8ECA0CEF.UnsavedChanges: You have unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to discard them?

8F2D3004.HUDConfigurationTooltip: Choose a configuration for your Life, Resource, and Skill bar.

9164A8D5.CrossNetworkCommunicationTooltip:
{c_highlight}Enabled:{/c} You will be able to text and voice chat with players on other platforms.
{c_highlight}Disabled:{/c} You will no longer be able to text or voice chat with players on other platforms.

91D56917.HotKeyChatPrevViewTooltip:
Selects the previous tab in chat when text chat is active.

{c_red}Cannot be rebound.{/c}

925E70F7.ScreenReader3rdPartyTooltip:
{c_highlight}Enabled:{/c} Allows for third party applications to handle screen reading and disables the platform's built in screen reader.
{c_highlight}Disabled:{/c} Defaults to the platform's built in screen reader.

92B3506B.ChatTextToSpeechTooltip: [PH] Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.

941CB823.FontScalingTooltip: Adjusts the font scaling for subtitles.

9423B17D.HotKeyScreenShotTooltip: Saves an image of your game screen to your local Documents folder.

94561372.HotKeyChatResetFadeTooltip: Resets the fade timer on the text chat widow.

9513908E.PartyGameChannelTooltip: Enable/Disable text to speech for the Party channel.

95BB029A.ControllerCycleTargetLockTooltipLeft:
Allows you to use the left stick to change your locked target.
{c_highlight}You will not be able to bind left-stick to other actions while this is enabled.{/c}

963574FC.ItemDropSoundHoverTooltip: Enables sound effects when an item in the world is targeted by the player.

96687746.HoldSkillsToggleTooltip:
{c_highlight}Hold All:{/c} Repeating or channeling Skills requires holding the Skill input.
{c_highlight}Toggle Sustained Skills:{/c} {c_important}Channeled{/c_important} Skills like Incinerate and Whirlwind can be toggled on and off. Repeated Skills require holding the Skill input.
{c_highlight}Toggle All:{/c} Repeating or channeling Skills can be toggled on and off.

97852255.HotkeyAbilitiesTooltip: Toggles the Abilities side panel, which contains the Skill Tree and Paragon board.

99997CB7.ScreenShakeTooltip: Show screen shake effects on certain Skills and abilities.

999C2094.CursorSensitivityTooltip: Determines the cursor sensitivity on the user interface.

9A1961C8.AutoEquipTooltip: Auto-equips items if you have an empty Inventory slot for that item.

9BA8CC74.CombatHitFlashTooltip: This will enable hit flashes on characters while hitting a monster or player during combat.

9BBEE13D.ResolutionPercentageTooltip: Adjusts the scale of textures used. Default is 100%.

9C01CB72.HotKeyMountTooltip: Summons the player's mount if available.

9D181442.SpatialSoundTooltip: {c_highlight}Spatial Sound{/c} is supported, but it's based on your current platform. Enable this through your system's settings.

9FE0934B.VOIPToggleTooltip: Attenuates game sounds when someone in your party is speaking in voice chat.

9FFABF79.HighlightObjectColorTooltip: Controls the color of interactable object highlights.

A12CAA4E.HotKeyPushToTalkTooltip: Activates voice transmission when held if the player is in a voice channel.

A3EA19CD.HotKeyReplyWhisperTooltip: Sets the player who last whispered you as your current chat target.

A4E8C072.TutorialsTooltip:
{c_highlight}Enabled:{/c} All tutorials will be shown.
{c_highlight}Disabled:{/c} Only tutorials specific to new features in Diablo IV will be shown.

A575B21A.MaxBackgroundFPSTooltip: Enable this option to limit and adjust the maximum framerate while running in the background.

A61AF76B.ReduceStrobingTooltip: This will disable several effects and lights in the game, reducing the amount of strobing in the game.

A6676B51.CharacterNameSpeechTooltip: Enable/Disable the character name during text to speech.

A678A761.PlayInBGTooltip: Allows the game to continue playing sound when it is not the focus window.

A6DFDE78.NotificationDurationTooltip: Adjust the duration of the toast window.

A7DF402E.SmartCoopMinimapTooltip: Only display the minimap when near an objective.

A89CFED8.QuickJoinTooltip: Allow friends to join your party without an invitation.

A8F10745.EnableTTSMessagesTooltip: [PH] Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.

A9D82837.ClockTooltip: Toggles the display of the clock over the minimap.

AAC70CB3.SpeechLocaleTooltip: Determines the language of speech audio.

AB3FAB5A.ChatBubblesPartyTooltip: Displays text chat from a party member over their head.

AC0002CF.BrightnessControlPrompts: Adjust the black point to maintain as much detail as possible in the left image. Adjust the white point to maintain as much detail as possible in the right image. Adjust brightness as necessary.

ACAB42DA.ColorBlindIntensityTooltip: Adjusts the intensity of the color blindness filter.  Lowering this will reduce the strength of the color adjustments in the game.

AEEEFF2E.ClutterDensityTooltip:
Controls the density and the distance at which ground clutter items, like grass and foliage are placed. Decrease to improve performance.

{c_highlight}Off:{/c} No Clutter
{c_highlight}Low:{/c} Short distance at which clutter items are placed with low density
{c_highlight}Medium:{/c} Medium distance at which clutter items are placed with medium density
{c_highlight}High:{/c} High distance at which clutter items are placed with high density
{c_highlight}Highest:{/c} High quality which also enables shadows from clutter

AF0E4FD1.CriticalDamageNumbersTooltip: Display floating numbers above monsters, showing critical damage dealt by the player.

AF190826.VoiceChatModeTooltip:
{c_highlight}Push-to-Talk:{/c} Your voice only transmits when your push-to-talk key ({hotkey:VOICE_PTT}) is held down. This key can be adjusted under Controls.
{c_highlight}Open Mic:{/c} Automatically transmits voice when microphone sound is detected.

B00DF647.MacNote: command key can be used in place of control key; fn+left mouse button can be used in place of right mouse button

B15EAB89.MonsterHealthTooltip: Show monster health bars above monsters.

B5A6D005.SoundOutputTooltip:
The output device is where your sound will play.

Default will match your systems output device. Use this if you want to play the game through head phones or a different set of speakers.

B61CAFA7.DriverWarningText: {c_red}Your GPU drivers are out of date! Some features may not be available. Please exit the game and update them. {/c}

B733BB00.KeyboardCombineMovePrimarySkillAndIntera:
{c_highlight}Enabled:{/c} Movement, Interaction, and casting the ability assigned to your Basic Skill slot will utilize the same binding.
{c_highlight}Disabled:{/c} You can define separate bindings for movement, interaction, and casting the ability assigned to your Basic Skill slot.

B8CB1C8A.VoiceChatAutoJoinTooltip: Automatically join voice chat in parties.

B924EA7E.VSyncTooltip: Synchronizes your framerate to some fraction of your monitor's refresh rate. Enable this if you see excessive screen tearing in game.

BA016EF2.ChatTimestampsTooltip: Appends a timestamp to chat messages in the format of your choice.

BA2C6EE4.ItemDropSoundTypeWeaponTooltip:
Apply this effect to all weapon items.

{icon:AttributeBullet, 0.6}  1-Handed
{icon:AttributeBullet, 0.6}  2-Handed
{icon:AttributeBullet, 0.6}  Offhands

{c_highlight}Enabled:{/c} You will encounter and be able to play with players on other platforms.
{c_highlight}Disabled:{/c} You will no longer encounter or be able to interact with players on other platforms. Clan feature will become blocked.

C05A9D53.ItemNameSpeechTooltip: Enable/Disable the item name during text to speech.

C0D87128.HotKeyFPSTooltip: Toggles Framerate Display at the bottom left of the screen.

C10A9934.ConsoleFrameRateLimitTooltip: Sets the maximum frame rate the game will be rendered at. Does not affect visual quality, but lowering this can give a more stable framerate.

C189F471.HotKeySkipTTSTooltip: Skips to the next text line.

C34FFC04.NotificationGuildMemberOnlineTooltip: Displays a notification when a clan member comes online.

Controls the number of samples drawn for Anti-Aliasing.

{c_highlight}Low:{/c} 4 Samples
{c_highlight}High:{/c} 8 Samples

C3D8EC03.AnisotropyTooltip: Determines the number of samples used for anisotropic filtering.

C4D6FA0C.OSCommandLeftRightTitle: Command left click as right click

C6C6D366.FontColorSystemTooltip: System messages will appear in this color in text chat.

C9A2873F.ReflectionQualityTooltip: Controls the number of probes used for reflections. Lowering this will improve performance and memory usage at the cost of some reflections being less accurate.

C9ACFC45.HotKeyJoinVoiceChatTooltip: Toggles speech to text transcription of your current voice channel. Only works when you are in an active voice channel.

CB043A21.HotKeyControllerMapTooltip:
Toggles the Map screen.

{c_red}Cannot be rebound.{/c}

CB2A9A39.HotKeyChatNextViewTooltip:
Selects the next tab in chat when text chat is active.

{c_red}Cannot be rebound.{/c}

CB81E100.WhisperGameChannelTooltip: Enable/Disable text to speech for the Whisper channel.

CC0392DC.HoldPositionInputModeTooltip:
{c_highlight}Hold:{/c} Activate Hold Position key by keeping the Hold Position key pressed.
{c_highlight}Toggle:{/c} Press the Hold Position key to toggle the behavior on and off.

CC4E6F9B.HotkeyMountCombatDismountTooltip: Dismounts the player with a combat ability.

CE5392C4.LetterboxTooltip: Display in widescreen aspect ratio regardless of screen resolution.

CEC70C6A.ChatBubblesTooltip: Displays text chat from a player over their head.

CF19841A.VoiceOptionTooltip: Defines the type of voice heard when text to speech is enabled.

CFD8A011.FontColorPartyTooltip: Party messages will appear in this color in text chat.

D0AA0A1A.DistortionTooltip: Controls whether screen space distortion is applied. Decreasing this may improve performance.

D2A3D14B.ControllerInteractToggleTooltip:
{c_highlight}Enabled:{/c} Interact and casting your Basic Skill will utilize the same binding.
{c_highlight}Disabled:{/c} You can define separate bindings for Interact and your Basic Skill slot.

D340CB52.SetBindingTooltip: Change the bindings for this action.

D4509F0B.FontColorErrorTooltip: Error messages will appear in this color in text chat.

D469375D.LockCursorInFullscreenWindowedTooltip: Lock mouse cursor to window while in Windowed (Fullscreen) and Windowed modes.

D59F2180.TextLocaleTooltip: Determines the language of text in the game and subtitles.

D6EB4D30.SoundSpeakerSetupTooltip: Set this to match your speaker setup. Choose Stereo or headphones or standard two-speaker setups.

D7E6DA49.LocalGameChannelTooltip: Enable/Disable text to speech for the Local channel.

D89BA7F3.MonitorTooltip: Select the monitor you would like Diablo IV to launch in.

D8B151C1.AntiAliasTooltip: Fullscreen anti-aliasing helps soften model edges. Disabling this may improve performance.

D91ADC1C.ItemDropSoundTypeOtherTooltip: Apply this effect to all other item types not listed above.

DAA9686B.NotificationAuctionHouseEventTooltip: Displays a notification whenever an auction house event occurs.

DB1395C9.HotKeyCycleChatTargetsTooltip:
Cycles through available chat targets when text chat is active.

{c_red}Cannot be rebound.{/c}

DCA83ED1.HotKeyScreenReaderSkipLineTooltip: Screen reader skips to the next content block.

DECC63A2.VoiceChatOutputDeviceTooltip: This output device is what incoming voice chat will play through. Default is your game sound output device.

DF091EAE.TranscribeVoiceChatTooltip:
Enables speech to text transcription of active voice channels.

View our Online Privacy Policy on {c_highlight}https://blizzard.com/legal/{/c} for more information.

DF2F0F4D.HotkeyMouseZoomTooltip:
Zooms the in-game camera in or out when the mousewheel is scrolled up or down.

While enabled, mouse up and mouse down cannot be used as bindings.

E2635CF7.SalvageConfirmationTooltip: Disables the confirmation dialog that appears when salvaging rare quality items.

E3280126.GammaDisabledTooltip: Gamma is disabled while in this mode. Please switch to Fullscreen mode to enable Gamma.

E42FA5BD.HealthNumbersTooltip: Display numerical health values on player health bars.

E45B49A8.FSR2Tooltip: When enabled game will render at lower resolution, based on selected setting, and will be upscaled to display resolution using temporal upscaling techniques.

E508AA7F.StoryGameChannelTooltip: [PH] Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.

E7865DB9.ColorBlindFilterTooltip:
Applies a filter to compensate visuals for color blindness.

{c_highlight}Protanopia:{/c} Difficulty distinguishing red light from green light.
{c_highlight}Deuteranopia:{/c} Difficulty distinguishing green light from red light.
{c_highlight}Tritanopia:{/c} Difficulty distinguishing blue light from green light, and yellow light from red light.

E7C58071.ShadowTooltip:
Controls both the method and quality of shadows. Decreasing this may greatly improve performance.

{c_highlight}Low:{/c} Low-resolution terrain shadows, blob shadows for units
{c_highlight}Medium:{/c} Low-resolution terrain shadows, high-resolution dynamic shadows near player
{c_highlight}High:{/c} High-resolution dynamic shadows for entire scene
{c_highlight}Highest:{/c} High-resolution, highest quality dynamic shadows for entire scene

E9ACFCE5.HotKeyForceMoveTooltip: Moves you to your cursor's location without attacking monsters or interacting with objects.

EB5FD848.CheckerboardTooltip:
When enabled, the game will render half as many pixels per frame and use data from previous frames to reconstruct a full resolution image. 

{c_highlight}Increases performance but may cause visual artifacts and lower image quality. {/c}

EBF66AB4.SoundChatLineBreaksTooltip: Enable/Disable a sound that plays separating chat line breaks.

ECE47122.NoCutSceneTooltip: Toggles whether or not cut scenes are automatically skipped while playing.

ED2CEF92.ParticlesTooltip:
Controls how many particles are spawned.

{c_highlight}Low:{/c} 75% reduction
{c_highlight}Medium:{/c} 37.5% reduction
{c_highlight}High:{/c} No reduction

EDF15CAB.ShaderQualityTooltip: Controls the quality of various visual effects on a case by case basis. Decreasing this may improve performance.

EEAC57ED.DLSSDriverTooltip: {c_red}Your GPU drivers are out of date, please update them to use DLSS. {/c}

EF3E24A0.SoftShadowsTooltip: Toggles whether soft shadows are rendered. Turning this off will increase performance.

F087DA3B.ControllerSwapSticksTooltip: If enabled, the functions of the left and right sticks will be swapped.

F0C1202C.ChangeLocaleWarning: Changing the language requires restarting the game. Are you sure you want to proceed?

F1B4407C.HotKeyActionWheelBindingMiddleTooltip: Uses the item or action bound to this position on the middle wheel.

F32DF418.RealIDHashesTooltip:
{c_highlight}Enabled:{/c} Displays the names of players whom you have friended using Real ID, as well as BattleTag numerical identifiers.
{c_highlight}Disabled:{/c} Hides Real ID names and BattleTag numerical identifiers.

F369BFE1.HotKeySkillsPanelTooltip: Toggles the Skill Assignment flyout from your Action Bar.

F3E18574.HotKeyQuestsPanelTooltip: Opens to your Journal within the Map screen.

F441311D.ControllerVibrationTooltip: Enable controller vibration effects on certain Skills and abilities.

F59B8044.ChatChannelJoinTradeTooltip: Trade chat channel is solely used for trading items.

F65C5E7C.SharpenTooltip: Adjusts the intensity of a sharpening filter on the final image.

F7A665D4.HotKeyPageDownChatTooltip: Scrolls text chat down by a page.

F8CF766E.PhysicsTooltip:
Determines the realism of colliding objects and gravity. Physics Quality relies on your computer's processor (CPU).

{c_highlight}Low:{/c} 75% reduction
{c_highlight}High:{/c} No reduction

F8F274C9.KeyBindingModifierRestriction: Modifier buttons cannot be bound by themselves

F96ADE63.JoinSTTVoicePrompt: Transcribe Voice Chat is not currently enabled. Would you like to enable it now?

F9BB4B56.ScreenReaderVolumeTooltip: Adjusts the volume of screen reader dictation.

FAD520A5.VoiceChatMicrophoneDeviceTooltip: This output device is what your voice will play through.

FB955E18.HotKeyReWhisperTooltip: Sets the player you last whispered as your current chat target.

FC6B605F.AdvancedTooltipsTooltip: Display advanced information on tooltips such as item property ranges, Lucky Hit chance on Skills, and indicators as to whether modifications are additive [+] or multiplicative [x].

FD92E882.HotKeyShowItemLabelsTooltip: Refreshes display of item labels on the ground.

FDD50F4B.BlackPointDescription: Adjust the black point to determine the maximum luminance that will appear black.

FE5716DF.ChatChannelJoinLocalTooltip: Local chat channel includes players near you within Sanctuary.

FEA5F1AD.TextToSpeechToggleTooltip: Enables or disables all text to speech.
